attributes.action: Make aviation fuel duty equal with petrol fuel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently aviation fuel has zero duty applied to it, neither is VAT levied on it.
If The United Kingdom and the EU are serious about reducing the gasses which are said to be responsible for global warming then aviation fuel duty should be brought in line with petrol.
The UK government should actively campaign for this law to be passed by all of The EU.
